programme.title: Fate Of The King
programme.desc: Okoye the taxi driver is about to marry a princess and the heir to the throne, this new development will reveal secrets that Igwe Pascal has been hiding all his life.

programme.title: Wify Comes First
programme.desc: Chelsea refuse to trust her husband and frustrates him at the slightest chance, now she will have to learn the hard way as her life flashes before her eyes.

programme.title: A Sting From The Past
programme.desc: Lydias past keeps haunting her, so she decides to do away with it. Now her past is back, but she will not let it ruin her.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna goes on an adventure. Ugomma does a masterclass in power, and the hunters face the aftermath.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna and Nnannas families deal with the aftermath of their escape. Jidekene is found, and Ezeugo is convinced Kamharida has been unfaithful.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Crown of Tears
programme.desc: Okwudili and his sister enjoy riches when their mother is unwell, but she couldnt touch their wealth. When she does, they became poor again.

programme.title: Stuck Between Love And Hate
programme.desc: Sheila loves her brother Ben so much that she can not stand him getting married to another woman.

programme.title: Success Charm
programme.desc: Amaechi refuse to study and ask his father to create a success charm to pass his exams, but will he still pass after the charms?

programme.title: My Ex
programme.desc: Fred and his fiancee are spending the weekend at their friends place Jake. This will go sour if Jakes wife does not tell him everything about her ex-boyfriend, Fred.

programme.title: For The Love Of Rose
programme.desc: Bryan love rose with everything and hopes to make her his wife, but things turns around for Rose when Ruger, a one nightstand shows up at her matrimonial door.

programme.title: Love Bridge
programme.desc: Can a relationship built on blame, grief, and a dark secret ever succeed when Charles lost his wife and blames the woman who helped her to the hospital?

programme.title: Hot Pants
programme.desc: King Vincent deliberately avoids having a child with his wife because of his evil plans She falls in love with someone else and this gets to the king.

programme.title: Omugwo
programme.desc: Many years ago, Funke told her best friend Amaka her deepest secret, of the paternity of her son, now their children are married. Who will be responsible for Omugwo?

programme.title: Devils Desire
programme.desc: Eric had a thing with his wifes friend Toki, now she tries to scheme her way into the house through all means possible.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A marriage proposal is procured and the betrayal of a close friend is afoot. Azubuikes problems intensify.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: The consequences of Adanna and Nnannas love come to rest at their door. Mkpulumma and Ahunna are running out of time, and Onochie steps up in the midst of chaos.

programme.title: Sister Margaret
programme.desc: Sister Margaret is selected by the Ancestors to serve them, while Chima struggles with infertility. Despite his inability to father a child, he seeks healing sister Margaret.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.desc: Scarlets love life changed for good after a plane crash that takes her face, and she has to undergo a plastic surgery. This shocks her husband Nater as he questions her new identity.

programme.title: Love On The Rock

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Century of the Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover detective is assigned to take down a triad boss, but as their friendship develops over time, the detective is torn between duty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, imperial guard Ocean secretly frees a kind monster gifted by Brunei, sparking a palace bounty and a frantic hunt to capture it.

programme.title: 3AM The Campsite
programme.desc: A group of friends going on a camping trip inside a haunted forest encounters a series of paranormal events. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: While Fang, a Ming royal guard, pursues an evil rapist, they are accidentally frozen. Thawed out to modern-day Hong Kong, Fang continues his pursuit to uphold justice.

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: When a Hong Kong policewoman, a Japanese detective and a security officer foil a plane hijacking attempt, they incur the wrath of the hijackers who are out for vengeance.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Angels
programme.desc: A spoiled girl is transferred to a new sports school where she meets a handsome kung fu team captain and decides to try wushu. Little does she know that would change her life...

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fas mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Fatty helps his friend Wah to learn martial arts from his Wing Chun master, so that Wah can take down the villains and avenge his mothers death.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: Monkey King emerges after Goddess Nuwas sacrifice to challenge the Jade Emperor, causing chaos that enables Buffalo Demon to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Playboy Cops
programme.desc: Two eccentric young detectives, Lincoln and Michael, go in search of a killer to bring him to justice, while vying for the affections of a young woman.

programme.title: Yesterday Once More
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs To, a pair of divorced professional jewel thieves, target to steal the same ruby necklace. A cat-and-mouse game begins as their love re-blossoms along the way.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Adapted from real events, the story is about a police special team fighting underground criminal organizations with wit and bravery, finally wiping out the enemy.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: Mei leads the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit to defeat the drug cartel in a fierce battle, and successfully rescue her undercover father who has his identity exposed.

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: The Last Blood
programme.desc: The Dalai Lama and Bees girlfriend are injured by the Red Army. Bee must find the only 3 donors with rare blood type P in 12 hours and fight against the terrorists to save them.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When Sergeant Lo loses his police revolver to four young triad thugs, he enlists the help of PTU Sergeant Ho and his patrol team to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Guns and Roses
programme.desc: Jin Shui risks all to save his family, fleeing France with the help of his friend. Amid challenges, Jin Shui faces a dilemma: love or loyalty to his friend.

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: An undercover police officer teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a powerful drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Return Of The Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Four orphaned buddies open a detective agency and before they know it, they are coerced into taking on some vicious gangsters...

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: An underground boxer loses his memory while escaping from the Bangkok triad. When he regains his memory after starting anew, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: The Fortune Code
programme.desc: Set in World War II, a secret agent is tasked with the mission to rescue Mammon, who knows the code to a $500 billion fund for the Chinese army.

programme.title: The New Option
programme.desc: An elite cop fulfils his dream to join the Special Duty Unit, facing rigorous training and the challenge of stopping a daring heist by a gang of dangerous criminals.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, one a drug lord and the other a police officer, clash in an endless battle between good and evil in a drug cartels turf war.

programme.title: Executioners
programme.desc: An evil deformed villain controls Hong Kongs scarce water supply, so the trio of Wonder Woman, Thief Catcher and Invisible Woman must team up and save the city.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Independence
programme.desc: Bruce Willis returns as Detective James Knight in a tense conclusion to the trilogy. Can he save the day when a vigilante threatens to blow up the citys Fourth of July festivities?

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: A compelling British psychological thriller set in 1964. A switchboard operator receives a distressing call from a woman.

programme.title: The Goldfinch
programme.desc: A book-inspired drama about a young boy who lost his mother in a terrorist attack. He has a coveted painting stolen before the tragedy as a memento of his mothers death.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: All Saints Christmas
programme.desc: A delightful holiday movie. When a popular RandB singers picture of her and her ex is misinterpreted as an engagement, her family insists he joins her on her trip back home.

programme.title: Crescent Gang
programme.desc: A heartwarming family film. A group of kids in foster care embark on a scavenger hunt to save their home when they learn it is being sold and they will be separated.

programme.title: A Royal Surprise
programme.desc: Thapelo Mokoena and Jennifer Freeman are the heartbeats of this film. After Riley learns Mandla is a prince while visiting his family, he must try to regain her trust and love.

programme.title: City Of Angels
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Meg Ryan star in this romantic fantasy. An angel falls for a woman and forsakes everything and becomes human to be with her.

programme.title: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss How The Grinch Stole Christmas. Jim Carrey plays the infamous Grinch, a creature who hates Christmas and plots to steal it.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Tom Cruise messes with forces unknown in this reboot. While trying to steal artefacts in the Middle East, a soldier accidentally awakens an ancient, malevolent princess.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: In this action movie, Aaron Eckhart takes on the criminal underworld. While investigating his partners murder, an LAPD K-9 officer uncovers a vast conspiracy.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Benedict Cumberbatch leads this high-stakes Cold War spy thriller. A British businessman joins forces with a Soviet officer to defuse the Cuban Missile Crisis.

programme.title: Fatman

programme.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Almost unimaginable after the mega success of Mad Max, the sequel came in bigger, better, and bolder, securing Mel Gibson a place in the post-apocalyptic action genre forever.

programme.title: Killing Field
programme.desc: Chad Michael Murray and Bruce Willis star in this action thriller. A grieving battle veterans life is disrupted when a cop and a drug cartel arrive on his property.

programme.title: Blinding Lights
programme.desc: A young aspiring female singer struggling with addiction wants to make it big in the Atlanta music scene. She decides to overcome the strikes she has against her family.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: The First Noelle
programme.desc: An ambitious young book editor named Noelle attempts to win back her ex after he returns home for Christmas with a new girlfriend, who also happens to be named Noelle.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning romantic drama based on a F. Scott Fitzgerald story. Brad Pitt stars as a man born already in his eighties who must live his life ageing in reverse.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: A crime-filled comedy about six students who decide to break into their school to steal the answers to an upcoming exam. With luck on their side, they all score high grades.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: Will Smith fights for survival in this gripping post-apocalyptic film. When a plague kills most of mankind and changes the rest into monsters, a man fights to find a cure.

programme.title: Fortress 2: Snipers Eye
programme.desc: The sequel to the action cyber thriller Fortress. Weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp, Robert (Bruce Willis) makes a daring rescue to save the widow of his old nemesis.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Oscar winner Matt Damon reprises his role as the CIAs most dangerous former operative. Hes on a mission to uncover more truths about his past in this explosive action-thriller.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: The third Mad Max film sees an exiled Mel Gibson and a tribe of kids battle Tina Turner in a swirl of stunning stunts, gladiatorial fighting, and general post-nuclear mayhem.

programme.title: The Last Job
programme.desc: Oscar winner Richard Dreyfuss seeks revenge on those who wronged him in this thriller. After his savings are stolen, a former mob boss returns to his old ways to find the thieves.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: 3 Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: The worlds greatest killing machine is three times as deadly when a mutated shark threatens a cruise ship. As the shark eats its way from one end of the ship to the next.

programme.title: 5-Headed Shark Attack
